resources.string: Are you sure you would like to clear the shader cache?

Mupen64Plus AE is developed and maintained by volunteers.

To fix graphical glitches, try changing the video plugin.

To fix lag, try changing the video frameskip setting or the video plugin.

For unplayable ROMS, try unzipping the ROM first or trying a different version of the ROM.

For touchscreen control issues, try changing the button scale or button layout.

For other issues, or if you're still stuck, please click the FAQ button below. For non-game-specific bugs, click the Report bug button below. We respond to the vast majority of posts within 24 hours. Honest.

Thank you for helping us improve the app!
Failed to open ROM file for reading.
App data missing, attempting to reload.
Connect to a netplay server with this game.
Start netplay server with this game.
Add a shortcut to this ROM in the default app launcher
Does NOT affect user settings, ROMs, game saves, or other custom data
Reset all global preferences to their defaults?
Reset all game preferences to their defaults?\n\nAny manual modifications you may have made to the config file will be overwritten.
Add, modify, and delete custom cheats
Change covert art to a custom image
Clear previously set custom cover art
Delete data for this game, from internal storage. Data in external storage will be left.
Are you sure you would like to delete all data for this game from internal storage?
Modifying this changes game timing, lower values can overclock the game but can cause instability.
Modifying this overclocks the R4300 processor by a factor of 2 each time the value is incremented, 0 is no overclock.
Modifying this changes game timing, this can affect some in-game clocks, restarting the game is required for this to take effect.
Needed for some ROM hacks, leave enabled to use game default.
Needed for some ROM hacks or Zelda games. Leave disabled otherwise.
Randomizes interrupts so that games that have random elements work correctly.
Hide buttons when not used by the number of seconds specified.
Core will run using a high priority thread, this can cause stutters on some devices
Allow volume keys to be mapped to controls
Allow back key to be mapped to controls, this will force the swipe gesture to be used for the in-game menu
Allow menu key to be mapped to controls, this will force the swipe gesture to be used for the in-game menu
Use Raphnet adapter raw USB access
If a Raphnet adapter is found, it will be used over other controllers in raw USB access mode.
Hold controller buttons for 3 seconds for certain functions to take effect, like the menu button.
Completely hide navigation and status bars
Map a controller to the next available N64 player while in-game by pushing a button
All emulated controllers are always attached
If enabled, all emulated controllers will be attached to the emulated N64 regardless if enough real controllers are attached.
Disable for speed (might cause video glitches)
May fix flashing textures in some games
Improves game speed at cost of framerate
Fixes texture shimmering and blur on distant objects
Minimizes latency, but may cause crackling in some games/devices
Swap the left and right audio channels
Enable time stretch audio to reduce crackling, but introduces audio lag
Better performance at the cost of audio latency.
Show games played within the past week
Show the region and dump information for each game
Original\nFill screen, no distortion (adds black bars)
Stretch\nFill screen, no black bars (adds distortion)
Stretch 16:9\nChanges the aspect ratio of the image to 16:9 (adds distortion)
Fixes issues with some devices that show an upside down screen with GLideN64
Enables GLideN64 hybrid integer scaling texture filter. This can hurt performance.
This can clean up odd colors around text but it can break other textures.
Enable dithering pattern on output image.
Dithering mode for image in RDRAM
Enable pixel coverage calculation. Used for better blending emulation and wire-frame mode. Needs fast GPU.
Performs vertex clipping in software, generally more accurate, disable if there are issues.
Disabling this produces more correct lighting and fog, but it is slower on some devices.
Enable writing of fragment depth. Some devices are not compatible.
Enabling this will improve performance, specially in 2D rendering, but may have slightly inaccuracies when rendering textures.
More correct 2D graphics but much slower and disables texture enhancements.
Bound textured rectangle coordinates to the values they take in native resolutions. It prevents garbage due to fetching out of texture bounds, but can result in hard edges.
Size of filtered textures cache in megabytes
Use high-resolution texture packs if available
Allow full use alpha channel of high-res textures
Force 16bit texture format for HD textures
Saves texture cache to disk on exit, causing a delay when exiting a game.
Use file storage instead of memory cache for enhanced textures.
Use file storage instead of memory cache for hires textures.
Dump in-game textures as they are encountered
Busy loop while waiting for work
Amount of overscan pixels to crop
Downsampling factor, Downscales output after VI, equivalent to SSAA
Use native texture LOD computation when upscaling, effectively a LOD bias
TEX_RECT primitives should generally be rendered at native resolution to avoid seams
Swap buffers when vertical interrupt has occurred
Swap buffers when set of conditions is satisfied. Prevents flicker on some games
Render N64 frame buffer as texture
Show images written directly by CPU
Force 0xb5 command to be quad, not line 3D
Force texrect size to integral value
Adjust screen aspect for wide screen mode
Force strict check in Depth buffer test
Apply alpha dither regardless of alpha_dither_mode
Scale vertex z value before writing to depth buffer
Set special scale for PAL games
Do not copy auxiliary frame buffers
Read framebuffer every frame (may be slow use only for effects that need it e.g. Banjo Kazooie, DK64 transitions
Big-screen mode (no touchscreen; gamepad/keyboard input only)
Uncheck this to specify a custom zoom value for this game
Simple scan lines that have low impact on performance.
Test Pattern to see shader effect, no game output will be displayed.
Blur effect, this can be expensive in performance.
N64 VI filter approximation, medium performance impact.
Fast approximate anti-aliasing, medium performance impact.
Approximates the look of a CRT, this can be expensive in performance.
ScaleFX is an edge interpolation algorithm specialized in pixel art.
Higher quality FP audio. Some devices may not be compatible.
Number of seconds before hiding touchscreen buttons
Please define multi-player controller mappings in game settings
Allow a single input device to control multiple players at once
Every time the touchscreen analog joystick is touched, the joystick is recentered
Uncheck this to specify custom player mapping for this game
Use flat game data folder structure
Keep all slot saves, screenshots, and in-game saves in the same folder
Use UPnP or NAT/PMP to automatically map external ports
Reset game? All progress since your last save will be lost.
Are you sure you want to stop playing?
Select a texture pack to delete
Are you sure you want to clear the selected high resolution texture pack?
Are you sure you want to remove this game from the library?
Mupen64 Plus AE is not installed properly. Please try reinstalling the app.
This app cannot proceed without these permissions
Mupen64Plus AE needs to be able to: \nRead your storage to read ROM files, save states, and configuration.\nWrite to your storage to write configuration and save data.
Mupen64Plus AE needs to be able to show notifications to display status of current foreground services.
Select the ZIP, 7Zip, HTS, or HTC file containing the high resolution texture pack
Error: HTC file must match this format [GAME_HEADER]__HIRESTEXTURES.htc
Select a ROM file or an entire folder to scan (zip/7zip/n64/z64 files supported)
No system file picker detected, please place your ROMs in the follow folder:
Invalid GameData folder, folder must be the exported GameData folder.
Invalid Profiles folder, folder must be the exported Profiles folder.
Waiting on host to start game…
Players have de-synced! Please exit game if you see issues.
Server netplay version doesn\'t match client!

Player %1$d, press a button or stick on your controller…

Current devices:
%2$s

Press a button, key, or joystick to map…

Current mappings:
%1$s
Unable to write configuration to SD card
